title: Project Manager - Construction
description: We are seeking an experienced Project Manager to lead construction projects from initiation to completion, ensuring delivery on time, within budget, and to quality standards.
responsibilities: Plan, execute, and finalize construction projects according to deadlines and budget
Coordinate internal resources and third-party contractors
Manage project scope, schedule, and budget
Ensure compliance with HSE policies and regulations
Conduct regular site inspections and progress meetings
Prepare and present project reports to senior management
Manage stakeholder relationships and communications
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or related field
Minimum 5 years of construction project management experience
PMP or PRINCE2 certification preferred
Strong knowledge of construction methods, materials, and regulations
Excellent leadership and communication skills
Proficiency in MS Project, Primavera, or similar project management software
Valid COREN registration
benefits: Health insurance for employee and family
Annual leave and paid time off

title: Renewable Energy Engineer
description: Join our growing renewable energy team to design, install, and maintain solar and hybrid power systems for commercial and industrial clients.
responsibilities: Design solar PV and hybrid energy systems based on client requirements
Conduct site assessments and energy audits
Prepare technical proposals and system specifications
Supervise installation and commissioning of renewable energy systems
Perform system diagnostics and troubleshooting
Provide technical training to clients and maintenance teams
Stay updated on renewable energy technologies and best practices
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Renewable Energy, or related field
3-5 years of experience in solar PV system design and installation
Knowledge of PVsyst, AutoCAD, and electrical design software
Understanding of grid-tied and off-grid systems
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent communication and customer service skills
COREN registration required

title: HSE Officer
description: We need a dedicated HSE Officer to implement and monitor safety programs across our construction sites and ensure compliance with all safety regulations.
responsibilities: Develop and implement HSE policies, procedures, and programs
Conduct regular safety inspections and audits
Provide HSE training and toolbox talks to workers
Investigate incidents and accidents, prepare reports, and recommend corrective actions
Ensure compliance with Nigerian HSE regulations and international standards
Maintain HSE documentation and records
Coordinate emergency response drills and procedures
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Safety Engineering, Environmental Science, or related field
Minimum 4 years of HSE experience in construction or oil & gas industry
NEBOSH IGC or equivalent certification required
Knowledge of ISO 45001, ISO 14001 standards
Strong communication and training skills
Ability to work independently and make decisions under pressure
Valid driver's license

title: Equipment Maintenance Technician
description: Seeking skilled technicians to perform preventive and corrective maintenance on heavy construction equipment and machinery.
responsibilities: Perform scheduled maintenance on excavators, loaders, generators, and other equipment
Diagnose mechanical, electrical, and hydraulic faults
Repair and replace defective parts and components
Maintain accurate maintenance records and reports
Conduct pre-delivery inspections and equipment commissioning
Provide technical support to clients and operators
Recommend equipment upgrades and improvements
requirements: Diploma or certificate in Mechanical/Automotive Engineering or Heavy Equipment Technology
Minimum 3 years of hands-on experience with heavy equipment maintenance
Strong knowledge of hydraulic, electrical, and diesel engine systems
Ability to read technical manuals and schematics
Good troubleshooting and problem-solving skills
Willingness to work flexible hours and travel to sites
Caterpillar, Komatsu, or JCB certification is an advantage

title: Civil Engineer
description: We are looking for a motivated Civil Engineer to support our construction projects through design review, site supervision, and quality control.
responsibilities: Review and interpret construction drawings and specifications
Supervise on-site construction activities
Conduct quality control inspections and tests
Prepare technical reports and progress updates
Coordinate with contractors, consultants, and suppliers
Ensure compliance with building codes and standards
Assist in preparing cost estimates and material requisitions
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering
2-4 years of experience in construction or consulting
Knowledge of AutoCAD and civil engineering software
Understanding of structural, geotechnical, and construction principles
Good communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to work in a team and manage multiple tasks
COREN registration preferred

title: Business Development Executive
description: Join our team to identify new business opportunities, build client relationships, and drive revenue growth across our service lines.
responsibilities: Identify and pursue new business opportunities in construction, energy, and equipment sectors
Build and maintain relationships with key decision-makers
Prepare proposals, presentations, and tender submissions
Conduct market research and competitor analysis
Develop and implement sales strategies
Collaborate with technical teams to develop customized solutions
Achieve monthly and quarterly sales targets
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Engineering, or related field
3-5 years of B2B sales experience, preferably in construction or engineering services
Proven track record of achieving sales targets
Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills
Strong networking and relationship-building abilities
Proficiency in MS Office and CRM software
Valid driver's license and willingness to travel

title: Quantity Surveyor
description: Experienced Quantity Surveyor needed to manage project costs, prepare estimates, and ensure financial control on construction projects.
responsibilities: Prepare detailed cost estimates and bills of quantities
Conduct cost analysis and value engineering
Manage procurement and subcontractor tendering
Process valuations, variations, and claims
Monitor project budgets and financial performance
Prepare final accounts and cost reports
Advise on contractual and commercial matters
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Quantity Surveying or Building Technology
Minimum 4 years of post-graduate experience
Membership of NIQS or equivalent professional body
Proficiency in cost estimation software and MS Excel
Strong analytical and numerical skills
Knowledge of construction contracts (FIDIC, JCT, etc.)
Excellent attention to detail

title: Administrative Officer
description: We need an organized Administrative Officer to support daily office operations, manage correspondence, and coordinate administrative activities.
responsibilities: Manage office operations and administrative processes
Handle incoming and outgoing correspondence
Maintain filing systems and office records
Coordinate meetings, travel, and accommodation arrangements
Manage office supplies and vendor relationships
Support HR with onboarding and documentation
Assist with event planning and logistics
requirements: Bachelor's degree or HND in Business Administration or related field
2-3 years of administrative experience
Excellent organizational and time management skills
Proficiency in MS Office Suite
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Attention to detail and problem-solving ability
Pleasant personality and customer service orientation
